translations: 订阅（subscription 的复数形式）；捐献

phrs.headword: subscription agree we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao

sentences.sentence: Before the 1830s, most newspapers were sold through annual subscriptions in America, usually $8 to $10 a year.
sentences.translation: 在19世纪30年代以前，美国的大多数报纸都是通过年度订阅销售的，通常是一年8到10美元。

sentences.sentence: Only 6.1 percent of users have ever appealed to supervisory depart we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao s and about half of them do not know how to cancel unwanted SMS subscriptions.
sentences.translation: 仅有6.1%的手机用户曾向监管部门提出申诉，其中约一半人不知道如何取消不想要的短信订阅服务。

sentences.sentence: A report last year pointed out that the costs both of subscriptions and of these "article preparation costs" had been steadily rising at a rate above inflation.
sentences.translation: 去年的一份报告指出，订阅费和“文章准备成本”的费用一直在以高于通胀率的速度稳步上升。
